description: Big mountains mean big descents on demanding terrain. Your gear needs to give protection from the elements and withstand the realities of off-piste wear and tear. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, the Rush Pant is made from Gore-Tex Pro with Most Rugged Technology – a next-gen material we developed in collaboration with Gore – for maximum durability and lasting protection. Articulated construction provides mobility on uptracks and descents, side zips ventilate, and Cordura® PowderCuffs™ seal out snow.
name: Arcteryx Rush Pants - Mens
